categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook fiction

nodes.text: A Very Special Meal was a short narrative written by Peter M. Schweighofer, and was published in the Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook.

Master Chef Tavvar Va'ran, the second-best Kubaz chef in the galaxy, is ordered by Guri, part owner of the exclusive Coruscanti restaurant Manarai and Black Sun assassin, to poison the food of Imperial Advisor Fendrilon Koozar. Va'ran complies with the instructions, resulting in Koozar's death.
